plain: 12 Monkeys, The City of Lost Children, The Fifth Element, The Matrix, Predator 2, Saving Private Ryan, Star Wars Episode VI: Return of the Jedi, Terminator 2: Judgment Day, The Nutty Professor, The Silence of the Lambs are all science fiction, action, or horror movies. They all have complex plots, and most of them have musical scores. The mood of the musical scores varies from movie to movie. The settings of the movies vary widely. The visual styles of the movies vary widely. The writing styles of the movies vary widely. The runtimes of the movies vary widely. The themes of the movies vary widely.
